project.name: Aion-Extreme
project.description:
Aion Extreme Emulator is a custom Release based of one of the last ZettaCore release, distributed in basic form, from Open-Aion. So most starting credits goes to them.
We hardly test every feature, changes or patches before update our SVN.
The source code (SVN) will be maintained on Google Project Hosting. Only some supporters and developers will have access to our source. It depends, how your contributions is.
Anyone can contribute with his/her code to the project. After a few good contributions if he/she wants to join he/she will be invited to the developers who can commit codes on SVN directly.
Our goal is to build a server step by step to be a stable basis of all Aion emulators. The stability and reliability will be more important than putting in all things as soon as possible.
Everyone can use the code for their private servers and private projects under the terms of GPL3 license terms - so none can profit from it or sell the code or the built program to anyone.

license.name: gpl3_or_later
license.nice_name: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later
